scripts.test: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL python3 -m pipenv run python -m unittest
scripts.test:cov: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL RMF_API_SERVER_TEST_COVERAGE=1 python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage run -p -m unittest && python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage combine
scripts.test:report: python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.lint: python3 -m pipenv run pylint api_server tests
